<h1>rsanne</h1>
<p> Pada soal diberikan 2 file (id_rsa.pub dan flag.enc)</p>
<p align="center">
  <img src="https://github.com/enomarozi/RSA-CTF-Writeup/blob/master/RSA/Image/rsanne.png">
</p>
<p>id_rsa.pub</p>
<pre>
-----BEGIN PUBLIC KEY-----
MIICUjANBgkqhkiG9w0BAQEFAAOCAj8AMIICOgKCAjEP////////////////////
////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
//////////////////////////3////////////4AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA
AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA
AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA
AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA
AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA
AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA
AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAECAwEAAQ==
-----END PUBLIC KEY-----
</pre>
<p>flag.pub</p>
<pre>

</pre>
<b><h3>Solution</h3></b>
<p>Generate Modulus dan Exponent : <b>openssl rsa -in id_rsa.pub -pubin -text -noout</b></p>
<pre>
RSA Public-Key: (4484 bit)
Modulus:
    0f:ff:ff:ff:ff:ff:ff:ff:ff:ff:ff:ff:ff:ff:ff:
    ff:ff:ff:ff:ff:ff:ff:ff:ff:ff:ff:ff:ff:ff:ff:
    ff:ff:ff:ff:ff:ff:ff:ff:ff:ff:ff:ff:ff:ff:ff:
    ff:ff:ff:ff:ff:ff:ff:ff:ff:ff:ff:ff:ff:ff:ff:
    ff:ff:ff:ff:ff:ff:ff:ff:ff:ff:ff:ff:ff:ff:ff:
    ff:ff:ff:ff:ff:ff:ff:ff:ff:ff:ff:ff:ff:ff:ff:
    ff:ff:ff:ff:ff:ff:ff:ff:ff:ff:ff:ff:ff:ff:ff:
    ff:ff:ff:ff:ff:ff:ff:ff:ff:ff:ff:ff:ff:ff:ff:
    ff:ff:ff:ff:ff:ff:ff:ff:ff:ff:ff:ff:ff:ff:ff:

    ff:ff:ff:ff:ff:ff:ff:ff:ff:ff:ff:ff:ff:ff:ff:
    ff:ff:ff:ff:ff:ff:ff:ff:ff:ff:ff:ff:ff:ff:ff:
    ff:ff:ff:ff:ff:ff:ff:ff:ff:ff:ff:ff:ff:ff:ff:
    ff:ff:ff:ff:ff:ff:ff:ff:ff:ff:ff:ff:ff:ff:ff:
    ff:ff:ff:ff:ff:fd:ff:ff:ff:ff:ff:ff:ff:ff:ff:
    f8:00:00:00:00:00:00:00:00:00:00:00:00:00:00:

    00:00:00:00:00:00:00:00:00:00:00:00:00:00:00:
    00:00:00:00:00:00:00:00:00:00:00:00:00:00:00:
    00:00:00:00:00:00:00:00:00:00:00:00:00:00:00:
    00:00:00:00:00:00:00:00:00:00:00:00:00:00:00:
    00:00:00:00:00:01
Exponent: 65537 (0x10001)
</pre>
<p>Convert nilai hexa modulus(n) ke desimal</p>
<pre>

</pre>
<p>Selanjutnya lakukan factorial dari Modulus(n) <a href="factordb.com">factordb</a> maka didapatkan p dan q</p>
<pre>
p = 2^2203-1
q = 2^2281-1
</pre>
<pre>
import base64
import gmpy2
from Crypto.PublicKey import RSA
from Crypto.Cipher import PKCS1_OAEP

n = 
p = 2 ** 2203-1
q = 2 ** 2281-1
e = 65537
d = lambda p, q, e: int(gmpy2.invert(e, (p-1)*(q-1)))

key = RSA.construct((p*q, e, d(p, q, e)))
key = PKCS1_OAEP.new(key)
with open('flag.enc') as fh:
    c = base64.b64decode(fh.read())
print(key.decrypt(c).decode())
</pre>
<h3><b>Flag</h3></b>
<pre>
the_flag_is_e4972e14a8bd2430bd52d41bad8060368c2fa4f56ef6deddf1b377773a761b1a
</pre>
